channel.title: On Guessing Well
channel.description: Recent content on On Guessing Well

item.title: About the Blog
item.description: This blog is intended as a space for me to explore ideas related to probability theory, statistics, machine learning, and the philosophy of science. Feel free to reach out via wctelson@gmail.com with questions, comments, or concerns. The views expressed are my own and do not necessarily reflect the views of my employers or partners.

item.title: Making Our Best Guess
item.description: The purpose of this blog is to answer the question “how should we make our best guess?” That is, given what information we have, how do we use that information to predict some outcome that we would find useful to know.
